title: Uncaught TypeError on Main App Load (Fixed: Aug 15, 2025) - v2.6.5
resolution: The event listeners for the 'Seed Database' and 'Clear All Data' buttons were being attached in `initAdmin` on initial page load, before the Developer Mode view (and its buttons) were rendered. This caused a 'Cannot read properties of null' error. The fix was to move these two event listener attachments into the `loadAdminSettings` function, which is only called after the Developer Mode view is visible, ensuring the elements exist before listeners are attached.

title: Stylesheet Path Inconsistency (Fixed: Aug 12, 2025) - v2.5.9
resolution: The `href` attribute for the stylesheet link in `index.html` was updated to use the correct `url_for('static', filename='style.css')` syntax, ensuring it correctly points to the file at `/static/style.css`.

title: Main Page Animation Updated to GIF (Enhanced: Aug 12, 2025) - v2.5.8
resolution: The CSS-animated flag and racecar SVG were removed from `index.html` and `style.css`. They were replaced with a single `` tag pointing to `waving-flag.gif` to simplify the main page's visual elements.

title: Main Page is Static (Enhanced: Aug 12, 2025) - v2.5.6
resolution: Added a racecar SVG to `index.html` and created CSS keyframe animations in `style.css` for its entrance and exit. The `main.js` file was updated to trigger these animations on page load and on the 'Get Ready!' button click, and to play the racecar sound on page load.

title: Synthesized Sound Effect is Not Ideal (Enhanced: Aug 12, 2025) - v2.5.5
resolution: The `playRacecarSound` function in `main.js` was updated to use the native `Audio` object to play an MP3 file. The unused `Tone.js` library was removed from `index.html`.
